intro: Psychotria subobovata, commonly known as the narrow-ovate Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its elliptical to ovate leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Psychotria subobovata is often found in lowland tropical forests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
